allSold.body: The Beguiling Ladies have all been minted

extraSections.text:
# Introducing Beguiling Ladies

 Beguiling Ladies is the second generative art drop by TAN DAO. First of all what *is* the 'TAN' in TAN DAO? It's the abbreviation of *Tits Are Near* which was established to support adult content creators like models, sex workers, photographers and NSFW artists. We make sure folks have a safe place they can call home and to support them wholeheartedly even if just in Web3. TAN DAO will host a series of seasonal NFT Collection drops; the sales split for funding the Dao, donation to SWASH Japan (Sex Worker Rights) and to featured artists all over the NEAR Ecosystem.

# Beguling Ladies: The Next Generation

 If you were curious about our first series, Near Nymphs, we launched our inaugural collection on April 6, 2022. What is now considered our *OG's*, were those that were a part of our first mint.

In preparation for our second mint, TAN DAO is also onboarding Sexy Vexel Models. The model will be paired to an artist, create a vexel art piece, and then it will be minted on Mintbase - the sales will also be split by the artist, model and DAO fund.

# TAN DAO Future

 TAN DAO is bringing a new mission and vision to Web3. A whole host of new and other projects. We are giving WL spots to the 1st 10 individual to show proofs in the Discord channel. As for the utilities you can check our [litepaper](https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vTJ2hsLEILq4VmzYnVrYzQN76wMgWr86GHYwpcap-1BQsQWsv4dyPzYLsEKfi-4Ek0BwGowlgOXfPN1/pub) for all the details you'll need.

# FAQ

 ### SUPPLY

 969 hotties

 ### DATE

 * WL Mint: June 22nd - 15:00 UTC
 * June 23rd - 15:00 UTC

 ### PRICE

 * WL Mint: 1.69 NEAR
 * Public Mint: 2 NEAR
